content: Howdy, I'm Cora Schneck, I just started at NCAR this week. I work in the Boulder Mesa Lab office (and remotely). I am going to be working on the GeoCat team on geocat-comp. I am a CU Boulder grad in CS and Biology with a focus on making science tools for Earth/Atmospheric/Planetary science. I'm excited to be here and can't wait to get to know folks!
Welcome to NCAR and GeoCAT, Cora! We are very excited to have you in the team!
